name: Sailing from Carthage
description:
Sail the ancient seas as you set off on this simple trading game.

Move from city to city with the click of a mouse and use the forces of supply and demand to make it big!

Cities will trade with each other (tiny ships), and if the merchants are intercepted they will send patrol ships (bigger). Look out for monsters, three hits and you have to start over! But using your skill and wit, amass 1500 gold to win!
